title: Practice-Centered Nursing Nutrition Education Using Gamification Based on Instagram

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nutrition knowledge and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Current nurses participate in gamification activities using Instagram on personal devices and conduct patient-tailored nutrition management projects in a PBL (Problem-Based Learning) format

learning_goals: Learners can analyze nutritional requirements for patient conditions with 80% accuracy through gamification activities.
Learners can enhance their ability to produce nutrition education content via Instagram-based assignments.
Learners can develop nutrition intervention plans applicable to real clinical cases through PBL (Project-Based Learning) projects.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
